p:
The title compound was prepared using the procedure described in Example 86 replacing cyclopropylmethylamine with 1-(4-aminophenyl)-3-methylimidazolidin-2-one.
1H NMR (CD30D, 400MHz) δ 9.07 (1H, d, J=4.4Hz), 8.87 (1H, d, J=8.4Hz), 7.80 (1H, dd, J=4.4 and 8.4Hz), 7.53 (2H, d, J=9.1Hz), 7.45 (2H, d, 9.1Hz), 7.38 (1H, d, J=1.8Hz)), 7.35 (2H, d, J=1.8Hz), 4.59 (2H, s), 3.84 (2H, m), 3.53 (2H, m) and 2.88 (3H, s)ppm.
FAB MS calcd for C 26H 22Cl 2N 6O 3 537.1 (MH +), found 537.1.
FAB HRMS exact mass calcd for C 26H 22Cl 2N 6O 3 537.1203 (MH +), found 537.1210.
